short_summary: EMC Hardware Maintenance and Support and EMC Software Maintenance and Support
description: Department of National Defence (DND), Ottawa, Ontario requires EMC Hardware Maintenance and Support and EMC Software Maintenance and Support for the period of January 29, 2023 to January 28, 2024
full_summary:
## Tenders Notice
### Procurement: EMC Hardware and Software Maintenance and Support

**Tender Identifier:** BPMO17396
**Contracting Authority:** Shared Services Canada
**Announcement Date:** January 9, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** January 17, 2023, 14:00:00
**Solicitation Date:** January 16, 2023 (Amendment 1)

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Enhanced Standing Offers/GSS/AFP/AGGS Evidence (if Applicable):** No requirement for Standing Offer or non-tenderable as a service.

**Goods/Services:** Shared Services Canada requires EMC hardware and software maintenance and support services for the Department of National Defence (DND).

**Regions of Opportunity:**
- **Canada**

**Regions of Delivery:**
- **Ontario (except the National Capital Region)**

**Trade Agreements:**
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Tender Description:**
The tender is for services to be rendered between January 29, 2023, and January 28, 2024, as outlined in the attached Request for Quotations document. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Contact Information:**
You can contact Agnes Kowalska, Supervisor, at (343) 551-9034 or email at [agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca).

**Links to Attachments:**
Attachments for this RFP are available on the Shared Services Canada website.

Note: I have kept the text concise and reformatted it to enhance readability. I did not describe what must be submitted to fulfill the RFP requirements, as that should be clearly
